title: Intro to Biomechanics
description: Introduces concepts and approaches for biomedical deformation and dynamics problems using the application of simple models from statics, mechanics of materials, kinematics, and dynamics.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: COE 2001 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and (MATH 2551 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2X51 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2401 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 24X1 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D)
